scenes.text: Hello! Societies can be confusing, so I am going to answer some important questions you may have about societies. Feel free to speak to the representatives the societies have here today for more specific information, but I can give you some general information!
Everyone can join societies, both people of the group a society is for and allies to/people interested in that group.

The university makes a concerted effort to ensure that all societies have varied events including social and quiet events, including a sober week in which many societies are encouraged host alcohol free events.

As Cardiff University students you can sign in to the Student Union website in which you can purchase memberships for your societies of choice, societies that do not have a membership fee are done this way also, only with no charge. You can still purchase some events without membership and give it a go sessions will be available prior to purchasing membership.

Each society may or may not charge a membership fee, however to join any society you must pay for the 'Guild of Societies' Membership. This is a one time payment of Â£8 as of June 2024, and essentially entitles you to join any society.
